# flipperzero-lightmeter 

[Original link](https://github.com/oleksiikutuzov/flipperzero-lightmeter)


<img src="images/framed_gui_main.png" width="500px">  

## Wiring

```
VCC -> 3.3V
GND -> GND
SCL -> C0
SDA -> C1
```
